ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger rum (dark or light)
des: "Whether it's 8 p.m. or 2 a.m., this potent rum-cola cocktail can make it last call for anyone, pirate or no!"
ins: Place the cherries and sugar in the bottom of a 12 ounce glass, and mash with a spoon or muddler. Add the rum and ice. Pour in the soda, stir, and serve.
